subject: Baseball
Knees
lead_paragraph: After Brian Cashman said C. C. Sabathia would have an arthroscopic debridement procedure next week, David Phelps helped the Yankees beat the Reds in their return from the All-Star break.
snippet: After Brian Cashman said C. C. Sabathia would have an arthroscopic debridement procedure next week, David Phelps helped the Yankees beat the Reds in their return from the All-Star break.
